nodes.text: The I-C2 Civil-Industrial Droid was a massive model of construction droid utilized by civilians. It contained a powerful fabrication system that was capable of producing slabs of building materials. The I-C4a combat construction droid was a smaller and militarized version of the I-C2 Civil-Industrial Droid that was manufactured by Veril Line Systems for the Galactic Empire's Imperial Corps of Engineers.
